info.brief_description: You have just graduated from high school and plan to travel but get shrunk instead!
info.description:
Your name is Kevin. You are 18 years old and have just graduated high school. It has been one week since graduation and you plan on traveling around for the summer before you go to college in the fall. The morning you are going to leave for your big trip you get a call from one of your friends. Your friend has other plans for you this summer by shrinking you.

This is a story that is MAINLY ASS PLAY! NO FEET and NOTHING GAY. Anything else is allright. Add to your hearts content!

Also, I put a lot of detail into my stories. I do this because I have it pictured a certain way in my mind. So the details and structure help ensure that when people make additions, they don't destroy the illusion I've created for the story.
